The public spending on education in the 57 Organisation of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) countries is one of the lowest in the world.

Contents

  • 1 Statistics
    • 1.1 Public expenditure on education (% of GDP)
    • 1.2 Scientifically productive countries
    • 1.3 Most productive universities in OIC[when?]
  • 2 Notes
  • 3 See also
  • 4 External links
